surveyTableHints.hint:
More Options icon

The More Options icon allows you to view the actions that can be performed on the survey.

This is a survey card

Clicking on it allows you to preview the contents of this particular survey.

takeThisTourAgainHint.hint:
You can take the tour again by clicking on this icon
See you later!

surveyTableSteps.intro:
Welcome to the Surveys Page

This page contains all the surveys you have created or have been invited to as a collaborator.

Surveys for You

This page will have surveys that you might be invited to fill during your program.
This tab shows the number of surveys you have created.
This contains the surveys that you are yet to respond to.
This section will contain all your surveys.
This contains all the surveys you have created or have been invited to as a collaborator.

You can create a new survey by clicking on this tab or button
Watch Demo

You can view a preview of the survey created by clicking on this tab.
Watch Demo

This card shows one of the surveys youâ€™re invited to fill and has a link to that survey.

Look Out! This is a hint

Look out for them. Click on them to get more information about certain parts of the page

moreOptionsSteps.intro: Hover on the icon to see more options for editing, duplicating and deleting a survey.

surveyPreviewModalSteps.intro: This is a modal that allows you to preview a particular survey
You can edit the survey by clicking on this button
You can view the responses on this survey by clicking on this button
This area will show all your survey questions. It is scrollable.
